## PBSamplerTypeInfo.toBufferLayout() method

Creates a buffer layout from this type

**Signature:**

```typescript
toBufferLayout(offset: number): UniformBufferLayout;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  offset | number | Byte offset of the layout |

**Returns:**

[UniformBufferLayout](doc/markdown/./device.uniformbufferlayout.md)
